class_notes:
Topic: "Time,  Space, and the Subatomic Realm"


"Why do clocks run slower near black holes and faster when orbiting the Earth? What does 'curved space' mean? How do the fundamental building blocks of matter behave on microscopic scales? This seminar will introduce the topics of relativity and quantum mechanics in an accessible way suitable for all majors who wish to understand their physical universe."
course_description: Freshman seminar, for first year students only. Variable topics.
